name: A Gladiator's Hell
description:
A Gladiator's Hell is a Singleplayer 2D side scroller set in a rundown city name Outlinn
You will play as a gladiator name "Gill" that is going thought the city "Hacking and Slashing" to reach is biggest enemy.
The story starts when "Gill is thrown out into the streets and need help to keep on living, which a mobster come to fulfill the role of his boss in the fighting pits where "Gill" will get his name Gladiator from, but things don't last long when the mobster gets greedy and wants more from "Gill", but he is not a pushover anymore.
